entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:51 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
